name: Handprinted "I AM WHAT I AM' scarf
description:
"I am what I am" lyrics on hand printed scarf, chocolate brown thick jersey material. 

This is hand cut unfinished edges to give a soft cosy finish around your neck. 
You can have white or mint green text!

This scarf is extra long!!
Size - 80"!! x 14/18"

Any questions please ask

Please see my website for other custom made quilts & gifts i have made www.hannahmadeinwales.com

P&P
Postage is set at £2.50 for 'delivery' in the UK. (Sorry these costs are set by Royal Mail). If you wish to collect it, please contact me via email to confirm. 
The postage cost will increase over 750kg with royal mail. Unless asked I will post to the PayPal address.

COLLECTION ONLY - When purchasing please choose 'YEMEN' as your country and the postage charges are set to £0.00 in the shopping cart.

Thanks for looking from

Hannah
HannahMade in Wales

name: 'Ava Dress' in Pink Check - Age 2 yrs
description:
This is a Age 2 HannahMade 'Ava Dress'. 

It is a girls 'A' line dress with a complementing yoke collar and buttons. This main dress fabric is in pink cheque mix fabric with blue and cream accent colours. 

Dresses show in the pictures are:
Age 2 yrs - applique hearts to the front and rear
Age 4 yrs - Square pink pockets to the front

This dress can be made to order from 6 months to 9 years. Other colours and styles are available which can be seen on my website & facebook. I also make 'Reversible' dresses in this style.

www.facebook.com/hannahmadeinwales... then click the "Ava Dress" album.

The material is a cotton/Polyester mix fabric.

P&P
Postage is set at £3.50 for 'recorded delivery' in the UK. (Sorry these costs are set by Royal Mail).  If you wish to collect it, please contact me via email to confirm. 
The postage cost will increase over 750kg with royal mail. Unless asked I will post to the PayPal address.

COLLECTION ONLY - When purchasing please choose 'YEMEN' as your country and the postage charges are set to £0.00 in the shopping cart.

Thanks for looking from

Hannah
HannahMade in Wales

name: MADE TO ORDER - Love Lunch Bag
description:
This is an order for a ladies Insulated lunch bag made for a stylish lunch break. The bag is an ideal size for an iPad/ Kindle

This bag will be made to order in fabrics requested and agreed prior to order.  Please allow up to 2 weeks to be handmade and posted.

Please note all fabrics are either vintage or purchased in a limited volume to avoid mass reproduction items, so please ask if they are still available prior to purchase to avoid disappointment.

You will need to choose the following fabrics for your bag:
-  Outer fabric - Hessian, cotton or vinyl (oil cloth)
-  Top (drawstring fabric) - Cotton, choose pattern

Each bag has a clear removable vinyl lining for a wipable surface.

Approximate bag sizes are as follows:

Exterior
8" (20cm) high (excluding draw string)
11" (29cm) wide x 4" (10cm) deep

Interior
7" (18cm) high
9" (23cm) wide x 3" (18cm) deep

This bag can be made in most colours and combinations. To see what I have made previously see the  'Love Lunch Bag' Album on my facebook page

https://www.facebook.com/hannahmadeinwales ....'click'....Love Lunch Bags

P&P
Postage is set at £3.50 for 'recorded delivery' in the UK. If you wish to collect it, please contact me via email to confirm. 
The postage cost will increase over 750kg with royal mail. Unless asked I will post to the PayPal address.

COLLECTION ONLY - When purchasing please choose 'YEMEN' as your country and the postage charges are set to £0.00 in the shopping cart.

Thanks for looking from

Hannah
HannahMade in Wales

name: DEPOSIT for Orders Pre-agreed
description:
This purchase is for means of placing an order for a bespoke order. 
Purchase the value pre-agreed with HannahMade and pay via PayPal. Usually 50%.

This will ensure the fabrics are set-aside for your order and the item placed in the 'order book'.
